meanings.definition: A person who eats greedily or voraciously.
meanings.sent1: The gorgers at the party finished all the snacks quickly.
meanings.sent2: The gorgers in the family always ask for seconds at dinner.
meanings.sent3: The gorgers at the buffet seemed to have bottomless stomachs.
meanings.sent4: The gorgers devoured the pizza as if they hadn't eaten in days.
meanings.sent5: The gorgers' appetite was insatiable, like a never-ending hunger.

meanings.definition: To consume food in a greedy or voracious manner.
meanings.sent1: The kids gorgers on the candy as soon as they got it.
meanings.sent2: She gorgers on popcorn while watching movies.
meanings.sent3: The raccoons gorgers on the leftovers left outside.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to slow down as he gorgers on the delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The wolves gorgers on their prey, leaving nothing behind.
